SELECT nvl(b.attendance_date,#{attendanceDate}) AS attendance_date ,c.STUDENT_PROFILE ,a.STUDENT_ID ,c.STUDENT_NAME ,c.STUDENT_GENDER ,c.STUDENT_BIRTHDATE ,nvl(b.attendance_status,'미출결') AS attendance_status ,nvl(b.attendance_memo,'미작성') AS attendance_memo FROM ATTENDEE_TABLE a LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTENDANCE_TABLE b ON (a.STUDENT_ID = b.STUDENT_ID AND TO_CHAR(b.attendance_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(#{attendanceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-dd')) JOIN STUDENT_TABLE c ON(a.STUDENT_ID = c.STUDENT_ID) WHERE a.PARTICIPATE_STATUS !='수강대기' AND a.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND a.ACADEMY_ID = #{academyId} ORDER BY b.ATTENDANCE_STATUS DESC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ATTENDANCE_TABLE S USING DUAL ON (S.user_id = #{userId} AND S.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND S.academy_id = #{academyId} AND TO_CHAR(S.class_date,'YYYY-MM-dd')=TO_CHAR(#{classDate},'YYYY-MM-dd')) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.attendence_type = #{attendenceType} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (S.class_date, S.user_id, S.CLASS_ID, S.academy_id, S.attendence_type, S.memo) VALUES (#{classDate}, #{userId}, #{classId},#{academyId},#{attendenceType},#{memo})
